author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, now that https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31253 is merged, we should update the Templates / GenErrors also for the all the other active geometries to keep into account the activation of the dual slope ToT in the phase-2 digitizer and clusterizer. This is especially true for D49 (i.e. T15) which is the one we keep validating, as the change in the clusterizer / digitizer affects everything.
**caveat**: T17 and T20 are eligible for clean-up and soon to be removed.

#### PR validation:

None so far, draft PR pending validation.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport needed.
cc @emiglior @OzAmram @tvami @skinnari
title: update IT CPE conditions, post dual slope ToT activation (also for other T* geometries)
